channel.title: window-manager on Future Insight
channel.description: Recent content in window-manager on Future Insight

item.title: Hyprland Window Manager Tour: A New Desktop Experience
item.description: As many of you may already know, I have been using Linux for several years now, both on servers and desktop systems. Throughout my journey, I have transitioned from a full-fledged desktop environment to a minimalistic setup tailored specifically for my needs. In this ongoing exploration, I recently made a significant switch in my window manager choice. While I had been using the Awesome Window Manager for quite some time, I decided to shift gears and embrace the relatively new and rapidly evolving hyprland Window Manager.

item.title: Midnight Tokyo: Awesome Window Manager
item.description: Linux has become an integral part of my daily computing routine. I find immense joy in using it, and there is no doubt that it has transformed my computing experience. I embarked on my Linux journey approximately three years ago, and since then, I have explored a multitude of distributions, seeking to understand what makes each one tick and what sets them apart. Some have proven to be less than satisfactory, while others have truly impressed me.
